item.title: Jimmy Chat Architecture
item.author: Jimmy_kiet
item.description: Current Architecture Requirements Acknowledgment of Messages messages should have three status: sent, delivered, read. Push Notification of Messages notify offline users of new messages once their status becomes online. Chat System Component Stateful Services: chat functionality Stateless Services: other functionality except chat Third-party integration: push notification Storage generic data: user profile, user friend list -> relational Database chat data -> key value stores API Design Send Message(sender, receiver) Read Unread
